name: Kullu
description: Kullu is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its scenic beauty, apple orchards, and adventure sports. The valley is famous for its annual Dussehra festival and offers numerous trekking and camping opportunities.

locations.name: Manali
locations.description: Manali is a popular hill station known for its scenic beauty, adventure sports, and vibrant culture. It serves as a gateway to various trekking routes and is famous for its apple orchards.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather, December to February for snow activities
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses from Delhi and Chandigarh, local taxis available
travelTips.accommodation: Wide range of hotels, guesthouses, and homestays available

locations.name: Solang Valley
locations.description: Solang Valley is a paradise for adventure enthusiasts, offering activities like skiing, paragliding, and zorbing. The valley is surrounded by snow-capped mountains and offers breathtaking views.

travelTips.bestTime: December to February for snow sports, March to June for other activities
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for adventure activities
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Manali
travelTips.accommodation: Stay in Manali and visit as a day trip

locations.name: Hadimba Temple
locations.description: Hadimba Temple is an ancient temple dedicated to Hadimba Devi, built in 1553. The temple is known for its unique architecture and is surrounded by cedar forests.
locations.address: Hadimba Temple Road, Manali, Kullu District

travelTips.bestTime: March to June and September to November
travelTips.transportation: Walking distance from Manali Mall Road

locations.name: Rohtang Pass
locations.description: Rohtang Pass is a high mountain pass offering stunning views of glaciers and peaks. It's a popular spot for snow activities and photography.

travelTips.bestTime: May to November (subject to weather conditions)
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for activities
travelTips.transportation: Requires permit, best to book through local tour operators
travelTips.accommodation: Stay in Manali and visit as a day trip

locations.name: Naggar Castle
locations.description: Naggar Castle is a historical castle that was once the residence of the Kullu kings. It now serves as a heritage hotel and offers panoramic views of the Kullu Valley.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June and September to November
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Manali
travelTips.accommodation: Can stay at the castle or in nearby Naggar town
